ygData.subject: FYI FBR
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok all of you out there that are drooling over the Flowing Black Robes that everyone seems to be wearing, he is a bit of advice for you.  I grouped with the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok all of you out there that are drooling over the Flowing Black Robes
that everyone seems to be wearing, he is a bit of advice for you. I grouped
with the following to get one last night and let me tell you it was not
easy:

25 Troll SD
27 DE Wiz
25 DE Wiz (myself)
24 WE Paladin (Go figure on this oen)
24 Gnome Mag

We attempted to kill Nejena 3 times and all 3 times she did not spawn.
She is a rare spawn but when she does she always has a Robe on. Along with
her in the room are 2 other mages and their pets that hit damn hard,
everytime we went in we almost lost someone in the party. If she does not
spawn some type of elemental will spawn in her place. So I hope this helps
you guys out. Good Luck


Shadair J'Axx
25th Wizard
Karana
